fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Host a wine-drinking party. All players that visit you will become tipsy and use their ability on a random player instead. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players cannot be targeted on you or themselves.
- Players with Redirect Immunity are not redirected.
- You are told who visited you when you host a party.
- You are told the players that were targeted instead by your party.
- Players that require multiple targets will have all of their targets randomized. Players are not repeated if possible.
